scene: EXT. BEACH AT SUNSET - DAY - WIDE SHOT

content.text: The sun bleeds onto the horizon, painting the sky in vibrant hues of orange and purple. The gentle roar of the waves provides a soothing background score. A young couple, ANNA and RAFAEL, walk hand in hand along the sandy shore, their silhouettes framed against the breathtaking sunset.

content.line: This is perfect. Just the two of us, the beach, and this incredible sky.
Yeah, it's like the world disappears and it's just us.

scene: INT. ANNA'S LIVING ROOM - NIGHT - MEDIUM SHOT

content.text: Anna sits on a plush velvet armchair, a steaming mug of tea in her hand. The living room is bathed in the warm glow of a fireplace, casting dancing shadows on the walls. A large window offers a view of the moonlit night.

content.line: I still can't believe we moved here. It's a huge change.
It's a chance to start fresh, Anna. To build something new together.

scene: EXT. COUNTRY ROAD AT NIGHT - NIGHT - SLOW MOTION

content.text: A dusty road winds through a field of tall, swaying grass. The moonlight illuminates the path ahead, while the surrounding woods remain shrouded in darkness. Anna and Rafael drive along the road in a vintage convertible, the wind whipping through their hair. Anna's hand rests on Rafael's arm, her eyes filled with a sense of wonder.

content.line: This feels like something out of a movie.
It's our movie, Anna. We're writing our own story.
